definition: identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to admonish/variant of 證|证[zheng4]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
variant of 身份證號碼|身份证号码[shen1 fen4 zheng4 hao4 ma3]/I.D. number

sentences.english: Could I see your ID and the notice left by the postman?
sentences.chinese: 请借我看身分证和邮差留下的通知。

sentences.english: The clerk refused to sell her alcohol because she didn't have her ID card.
sentences.chinese: 店员拒绝卖酒给她，只因为她没带她的身分证。

sentences.english: I attach a copy of my Hong Kong Identity Card.
sentences.chinese: 现付上本人香港身分证副本一份。

sentences.english: Passport number should be given only if you do not possess HKID card.
sentences.chinese: 有香港身分证的下填写护照号码。

sentences.english: Sir, could you show me your ID card?
sentences.chinese: 先生，可以让我看一下你的身分证吗？

sentences.english: Passport numbers should ONLY be given when employees do not possess HKID cards.
sentences.chinese: 只在雇员没有香港身分证的情况下，才填写护照号码。

sentences.english: Please provide a copy of Hong Kong Identity Card of the applicant together with the application.
sentences.chinese: 请于递交申请时，附上申请人香港身分证副本。

sentences.english: The game is open to all holders of Hong Kong Identity cards or permanent residents.
sentences.chinese: 所有持有效身分证或香港永久居民均可参加。

sentences.english: Students who said they'd left theirs in the dorm or at home had a mug shot taken.
sentences.chinese: 那些说把身分证留在宿舍或家中的学生都拍了面部照。

sentences.english: Have you enclosed a copy of your Hong Kong Identity Card and certificate(s) of professional qualification(s) ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否已附上身分证及专业资格证书副本乙份？

sentences.english: Can you let me look at your I. D. card?
sentences.chinese: 你能把身分证借给我看吗？

sentences.english: Section A2 - Copy of the Business Registration Certificate and Copy of Hong Kong Identity Card of the authorized person.
sentences.chinese: 商业登记证和获授权人士香港身分证的副本。

sentences.english: They said that compulsory identity cards would infringe civil liberties.
sentences.chinese: 他们说强制办理身分证会侵犯公民的自由。

definition: Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]

debit card/ATM card
(Tw) household registration certificate (identity document)
passbook/bankbook
boarding pass
report the loss to the authorities concerned

fingerprint/thumbprint/also written 指摹[zhi3 mo2]
mobile phone (Tw)

USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
household register
(Tw) to be in the care of one's relatives/to be dependent on a relative/to draw on family connections
EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
